translation.en: [Cian] What do you think love is?
Love is a dagger.
A pretty thing,
a thing that enchants, but also hurts.
translation.ko: 넋을 잃고 보게 하지만 찔리면 아프죠

translation.en: -[Cian] Welcome back. -Yes, I am back.
translation.ko: - 다시 온 걸 환영해요 - 네, 다시 왔죠

translation.en: -[Cian] Should we get started? -Let's get started.
-Oh, Cian! -[Cian] Yeah?
-How's this smile? -That's pretty good.
[Cian] Why do you wanna find love?
I have so much love to give.
When there's love, there is a right match, feels like the slipper fits.
translation.ko: 사랑하면 둘이 꼭 맞아요 유리 구두에 발이 맞듯

translation.en: I really would like to have someone special
with whom I can share the best moments of my life.
translation.ko: 제 삶의 좋은 순간들을 나누고 싶어요

translation.en: [narrator] Finding love can be hard for anyone.
translation.ko: 사랑을 찾는 건 누구에게나 힘든 일입니다

translation.en: It's finally my turn! My turn!
To second chances at finding love.
[narrator] And for some people, it can feel like an impossible dream.
My heart still goes with him.
translation.ko: 제 마음은 여전히 그 사람을 향해요

translation.en: -Just look for that fish in your pond. -Oh yes.
translation.ko: - 연못 안의 물고기를 찾아 - 아, 그래

translation.en: [narrator] This series follows people on the autism spectrum…
translation.ko: 이 시리즈는 자폐 스펙트럼인 사람들의 이야기를 보여줍니다

translation.en: Quite a grip you got.
So magnanimous marvelous.
…as they navigate the confusing world of relationships…
translation.ko: 그렇게 이들은 험난한 연애와 데이트의 세계를…

translation.en: This is very interesting.
…and dating.
-Are you a little nervous? -Uh… Mm…
He says yes. I'm going on a date!
translation.ko: 그 사람이 좋대 나 데이트 나간다!

translation.en: I, um…
Do I just intro… introduce myself?
[Cian] Yeah, go for it.
Hello. I'm Connor. I live in Georgia.
And… I'm interested in starting a romantic relationship.
[Cian] What does autism mean for you?
Well… for me, it means,
in short words, a more vivid imagination.
I know that sounds corny, but… it's how I feel about it.
[Cian] How long have you been single, Connor?
Oh, I… I've been single my whole life.
Loneliness, it follows me wherever I go.
I'm watching Transformers.
Right now, Optimus is showing a holographic depiction of Cybertron
translation.ko: 지금 옵티머스가 홀로그램으로 사이버트론을 보여주고 있죠

translation.en: and the Decepticon capital city of Kaon
where Megatron ruled as Lord High Protector.
translation.ko: 케이온은 메가트론이 최고 수호자로 지배한 곳이죠

translation.en: I will say this about Michael Bay.
He really has a flair for explosions.
translation.ko: 폭발 장면을 진짜 잘 찍는 거 같아요

translation.en: Now, if you'll kindly follow me,
I'll show you my room.
[Connor] Here's my sword collection.
My most recent addition,
the ulfberht.
It's made of high carbon steel,
or crucible steel, if you will.
A truly magnificent weapon.
[Cian] How do you feel about being single?
I feel kinda left out
because all my siblings found significant others.
Yeah. All of them except me.
I don't wanna spend the rest of my life alone.
translation.ko: 남은 인생을 혼자 보내고 싶진 않아요

translation.en: [man 1] Who all wants coffee?
-Connor. -[woman 1] Connor, you wanted some, right?
-[man 1] Anyone else? -[woman 1] I'm good.
[narrator] Connor lives with his mom, Lise, stepdad, Tony, and his three siblings.
translation.ko: 코너는 엄마 리스와 새아빠 토니 세 형제자매와 함께 삽니다

translation.en: Thank you.
So, Connor, is there anything you're nervous about starting to date?
translation.ko: 코너, 데이트 시작하려니 긴장되는 부분 있어?

translation.en: Well, it's a big thing.
Although there is no change in my facade, I am quite excited.
translation.ko: 밖으로 표는 안 나도 굉장히 기대하고 있어요

translation.en: Who knows? Maybe I'll meet a girl who actually knows a thing or two
translation.ko: 데이트에 나온 여성과 공감대를 형성할지도 모르죠

translation.en: about the Greeks or maybe even the Vikings.
translation.ko: 그 여성이 그리스인이나 바이킹에 대해 안다면요

translation.en: One can only dream, but I'm sure she's out there.
translation.ko: 많지는 않겠지만 분명 그런 여성이 있겠지

translation.en: Ooh! Or I could tell her about how democracy got started.
translation.ko: 아니면 민주주의의 발단에 대해 얘기해 줄 수도 있겠죠

translation.en: -That would be riveting. -If you wanna put her to sleep!
translation.ko: - 퍽도 흥미롭겠다 - 누구 재울 일 있니?

translation.en: -Maybe not on the first date. -[Lise] That would be a snorefest.
translation.ko: - 첫 데이트 땐 무리지 - 지루해서 코 박고 자겠네

translation.en: Save that for date two, maybe.
Maybe I should ask her if she likes pets.
Considering we have three dogs, that's a good question.
translation.ko: 우리 반려견이 세 마리니까 좋은 질문이네

translation.en: Who wouldn't love that sweet, adorable face?
translation.ko: 저 귀엽고 사랑스러운 얼굴을 누가 싫어하겠어요?

translation.en: -[sneezes] -[Connor] Look at that.
Oh, all right, all right.
Coco. Aw, look at you! Aw.
[Lise] So Connor is my firstborn child.
We have a big family, siblings.
We all adore him. I mean, he is just a total rock star.
translation.ko: 모두 코너를 사랑해요 정말 멋진 아이거든요

translation.en: What's your little German nickname?
I call Coco my Liebchen,
my little love.
Yeah. You two are ridiculous.
As a child, he got bullied because he was different.
translation.ko: 어릴 때 다르다는 이유로 괴롭힘을 당했어요

translation.en: We actually pulled him out of school in eighth grade
'cause it was… it was so cruel, what he was experiencing.
-Look at her. -[Connor] Yeah.
[Lise] She just loves her mans.
Connor has expressed a loneliness.
When I'm off with my husband on a date
or his siblings are off with friends or on dates,
he is just sitting in the house with the dogs.
[Cian] Does he have friends?
[Lise] No, um, not really.
[Cian] That can be tough.
Yeah, sorry.
That one hurts.
But he has us.
And, uh, we're pretty cool.
So, Connor, for a girlfriend, like, what do you want her to look like?
translation.ko: 코너, 여자 친구 외모는 어땠으면 좋겠어?

translation.en: Well, I'm usually into brunettes,
but… I… I could settle for a blonde.
-[sister] Settle! -[laughter]
[Connor] I… I don't know.
Preferably dark-haired women
and maybe blue eyes.
[Cian] Are you describing your mum?
-[Lise laughs] -What?!
[Connor] Maybe younger.
-[laughter] -Someone… someone younger.
Hopefully.
No offense, Mom.
None taken, Connor, never with you.
-[Cian] Hello, Dani. -Hello, Cian.
[Cian] Welcome back.
Welcome back. I can't believe it's been a while.
[Cian] So, last season, you sort of found love but not quite,
translation.ko: 지난 시즌에 사랑을 찾은 듯했지만 아니었고

translation.en: and ultimately you ended up single again.
Oh yes.
I have learned many lessons.
It's best for me to get to know the person first
translation.ko: 먼저 그 사람에 대해 알고 난 뒤에

translation.en: before approaching for the kiss.
[Cian] How's your dating life at the moment?
Well, my dating life is, um… imagine crickets sound effects.
Yep, no dating life right now, but the search for love continues.
translation.ko: 네, 아무 진전도 없지만 사랑 찾기는 계속되고 있어요

translation.en: I've been receiving a lot of dating inquiries on social media,
translation.ko: 소셜미디어로 데이트 요청을 아주 많이 받았어요

translation.en: but the biggest majority of them are creepy.
Like, for example, some guy messaged me
translation.ko: 예를 들어, 어떤 사람은 이런 메시지를 보냈더라고요

translation.en: saying, "Wanna come over to Colorado to go on a date?"
translation.ko: 예를 들어, 어떤 사람은 이런 메시지를 보냈더라고요 '콜로라도로 와서 나랑 데이트할래요?'

translation.en: Kinda creeps me out.
[Cian] What's happening today, Dani?
Well, I'm going on a blind date. Another blind date in Venice.
And I'm looking for a nice necklace to go with.
translation.ko: 여기에 잘 어울리는 목걸이를 찾고 있어요

translation.en: [Cian] How do you feel about going on another blind date?
Oh my goodness. This is gonna be another exciting one.
translation.ko: 세상에나, 이번에도 신나는 데이트가 될 거예요

translation.en: I can't wait. Who will it be?
Elasticity stone or the goo shifter stone from Kid Cosmic?
translation.ko: '우주 히어로 키드'에 나오는 탄력 스톤 아니면 변형 스톤?

translation.en: You know what? I'll just stick with the elasticity stone.
[Cain] Who's this?
"Hi. The name's Captain Eron."
He's a mythical creature called an Earthian Blablex.
I was 13 when I created him.
He's, like, a photoheterotrophic organism.
translation.ko: 광종속 영양 유기체라고 할 수 있어요

translation.en: I just put him away. Okay.
I am pumped and ready.
I still live with my aunt and uncle,
but it would be nice for me to live on my own,
and especially if I find the right match.
I would like a guy who is independent with, like, for example… own a home,
translation.ko: 자립심 강한 남자면 좋겠어요 자기 집도 있고

translation.en: capable of driving.
If he has a degree, if he has a plan, he has a job.
translation.ko: 학위랑 인생 계획 직업이 있으면 좋겠어요

translation.en: [Cian] So basically, you want a guy who has his shit together?
translation.ko: 한마디로 자기가 싼 똥은 치울 줄 아는 사람이군요?

translation.en: Oh yes. [chuckling]
Language!
[narrator] Dani has lived with her aunt Sandy and uncle Patrick
translation.ko: 대니는 12살 때부터 이모 샌디와 이모부 패트릭과

translation.en: since she was 12 years old.
[Dani] Sugar, spice, and everything nice.
The ingredients to make the perfect girlfriend.
-I'm just doing a Powerpuff Girls parody. -[Patrick] I see.
Yeah. All right, but how are you feeling about this blind date?
I'm not so nervous anymore. Now I know what a blind date is all about.
translation.ko: 막 긴장되진 않아요 이제 소개팅이 어떤 건지 아니까요

translation.en: Good. What kind of person do you hope that this new date is?
translation.ko: 잘됐구나, 오늘 데이트 상대는 어떤 사람이면 좋겠어?

translation.en: Well, I hope this new date already has an animation job
translation.ko: 오늘 데이트 상대는 이미 애니메이션 쪽 직업이 있고

translation.en: and already has his portfolio together.
[Patrick] Yeah, but what about him as a person?
Hoping he's properly groomed.
What do you mean? Like he's taken a shower?
Like taking a shower. He doesn't smell.
He knows how to brush his teeth. Respect my boundaries.
translation.ko: 양치할 줄도 알고 제 경계선을 지켜주고요

translation.en: -That's a good one. -[Dani] Respect my boundaries.
-Don't be creepy. -[Sandy laughs]
I don't want him to be, like, creepy. Like, "Hey, how are you, baby? I love ya."
translation.ko: 소름 끼치는 사람은 싫어요 '안녕, 자기? 사랑해' 이런 거 있잖아요

translation.en: -Something like that. -[laughter]
[Sandy] Let's hope not.
-[Patrick] Yes. -I hope not.
-[Sandy] Ready for this? -[Dani] I'm ready.
-Okay, here we go. -Okay.
Thank you, Uncle Patrick.
-Behave yourself. -Thank you.
-And thank you, Auntie Sandy. -[softly] Don't behave yourself.
-All right. Hey! -[Sandy chuckles]
-[Cian] Hello. -Oh yes. Hello, how are you doing?
-[Cian] Good. Good to see you again. -It is very good to see you all.
translation.ko: - 다시 보니 좋네요 - 모두 이렇게 봐서 좋아요

translation.en: So much has happened since we last saw each other.
translation.ko: 마지막으로 본 후로 많은 일이 있었어요

translation.en: A lot of people have been recognizing me. That's pretty cool. I… I do like it. I…
translation.ko: 많은 분이 절 알아봐 주셔서 진짜 기쁘고 좋아요

translation.en: Of course, I don't wanna sound like a glory seeker,
but I don't mind the attention.
I'm a… I guess I'm kind of a pseudo-celebrity, actually.
translation.ko: 얼추 유명인이 다 됐다고 할 수 있죠

translation.en: That's not too bad. Mm-hmm.
I have returned
because I am still continuing my search for love.
translation.ko: 제가 돌아온 건 사랑을 찾는 여정을 계속하고 있어서예요

translation.en: I'm still looking, still hoping to find that special someone,
translation.ko: 아직 저만의 특별한 짝을 찾고 있고, 찾길 바라죠

translation.en: someone with whom I could share the best moments of my life.
translation.ko: 제 삶의 가장 좋은 순간들을 함께할 사람을요

translation.en: Because I don't think I have much that is new at this point.
translation.ko: 새롭게 보여드릴 건 많지 않을 거 같은데

translation.en: Oh, and I don't think I showed you this last time.
translation.ko: 아, 이건 지난번에 안 보여드렸을 거예요

translation.en: See, my brother and his wife got me this walking stick for Christmas.
translation.ko: 제 동생과 동생 아내가 크리스마스 선물로 이 지팡이를 줬어요

translation.en: They had the vendor wood-burn my name into it,
and he also wood-burned two spiders into it.
It wasn't varnished when they got it. When they gave it to me, it was bare wood.
translation.ko: 원래 광택제를 안 칠한 물건이었고 저도 그 상태로 받았는데

translation.en: But, yes, I varnished it, of course.
I like having my wood varnished so it'll better survive the elements.
translation.ko: 목제 제품은 광택제를 칠해야 낡지 않고 오래 쓸 수 있죠

translation.en: [Cian] What d'you use the stick for?
Oh, when I go out hiking, I just… I have it with me just in case, you know,
translation.ko: 하이킹하러 갈 때 만일에 대비해서 가져가요

translation.en: for balance or support or supposing the rare chance
translation.ko: 넘어지지 않게 균형도 잡고 확률은 낮지만 사나운 야생동물을 만날 수도 있잖아요

translation.en: I ever encountered any hostile wild animals,
translation.ko: 확률은 낮지만 사나운 야생동물을 만날 수도 있잖아요

translation.en: I could use it to fend off… fend them off,
or, I suppose, other hikers who are hostile. Yes. [chuckles]
translation.ko: 하이킹하는 다른 사람들이 사나울 수도 있고요

translation.en: I was absolutely certain that I would have both my own house and a wife
translation.ko: 전 정말 확신했어요 30살이 되기 전에 내 집과 아내가 있을 거라고요

translation.en: before I was 30, and now I'm 35.
translation.ko: 30살이 되기 전에 내 집과 아내가 있을 거라고요 지금 35살인데 아직 둘 다 없네요

translation.en: I still do not have either of those. Mm.
[Cian] So, what have you been doing to try and find love lately, James?
translation.ko: 사랑을 찾기 위해 어떤 걸 시도해 봤나요?

translation.en: Oh, practically everything.
I've been to, like, 20 or 30 speed dating events.
And, no, I haven't had any matches, which is a bit unfortunate.
translation.ko: 짝이 이뤄지진 않아서 그게 조금 안타깝죠

translation.en: I have to wonder, maybe I have, and the organizers simply didn't tell me,
translation.ko: 짝이 이뤄졌는데 주최 측에서 말을 안 했나 싶어요

translation.en: but I don't want to believe that anyone would be deceptive like that,
translation.ko: 그런 걸 속이는 사람이 있을 거라고 믿고 싶진 않지만

translation.en: but I just think
it's statistically highly unlikely I would have no matches.
translation.ko: 제가 짝이 안 될 확률이 높지 않을 거란 말이죠

translation.en: But I am not allowing myself to be discouraged.
translation.ko: 그래도 낙담하지 않으려고 마음을 다잡고 있어요

translation.en: I, um, have to keep looking.
Meet a nice, understanding lady that can appreciate you for who you are.
translation.ko: 널 있는 그대로 사랑해 줄 착하고 아량 넓은 여자를 만나

translation.en: Oh, I sure hope so.
-Oh, hello, Dad. How are you doing? -I'm doing great, thanks. How are you?
translation.ko: - 아빠, 좀 어떠세요? - 아주 좋다, 넌 어떠니?

translation.en: Yes, okay, not too bad.
-[Lawrence] Yep. -That's not bad.
[narrator] James lives with his parents, June and Lawrence, just outside Boston.
translation.ko: 제임스는 부모님인 준과 로런스와 함께 보스턴 인근 외곽에 삽니다

translation.en: There are eight billion people on this planet. I…
There has to be some… at least one person who's a match for me.
translation.ko: 그중에 적어도 한 명은 저와 천생연분이겠죠

translation.en: I have accounts on… [sighs]
…um, no less than six different online dating services.
And sometimes I have conversations with women, but they don't last too long--
translation.ko: 거기서 가끔 여성들과 대화하는데 길게 이어지진 않고…

translation.en: -Th-- -Aren't your feet cold?
[James] No, my feet are fine. Do not worry.
[Cian] Have your thoughts changed on the person you're looking for?
translation.ko: 어떤 사람을 찾는지 생각에 변화가 있을까요?

translation.en: You want someone that's understanding.
Shouldn't that be an automatic presumption?
Not all the time.
Sometimes people will look and say, "Oh, she's beautiful. That's who I want,"
translation.ko: 외모만 보고 이럴 수 있지 '정말 예쁘다, 저 사람을 원해'

translation.en: and she could be a… a stupid airhead or something.
translation.ko: 그런데 알고 보니 미련한 여자일 수도 있어

translation.en: I don't want to sound too shallow,
but physical attractiveness isn't everything, but it is important.
translation.ko: 신체적 매력이 다는 아니어도 중요하다고 생각해요

translation.en: -Yeah, I know. -[James] I put effort into my appearance.
translation.ko: - 물론이지 - 전 제 외모에 신경 쓰거든요

translation.en: I brush my hair, brush my teeth. I try to keep my face clean.
translation.ko: 머리도 빗고 양치도 하고 얼굴도 깔끔하게 유지하죠

translation.en: I'm not so self-centered to think that I'm the most attractive of men,
translation.ko: 제가 가장 매력적인 남자라고 생각하는 건 아니지만

translation.en: but I don't think I'm that bad-looking.
No, honey, you're not.
Uh, I'm not going to stay attractive forever.
translation.ko: 평생 이 외모를 지닐 순 없어요

translation.en: You know, I… when I… as I get older, I'm going to lose my looks.
translation.ko: 나이가 들면 들수록 제 미모를 잃을 거라고요

translation.en: -Who said this? -Well, uh, I… it's just part of aging.
-You don't look as good as you get older. -I beg your pardon! -[James hesitates] -[giggles]
translation.ko: - 늙을수록 미모를 잃죠 - 내 앞에서 그런 소릴!

translation.en: I've been told many times I'm a good-looking 73-year-old man. Okay?
translation.ko: 73살 훈남이라는 소리를 밥 먹듯 들은 사람이야, 알겠어?

translation.en: [James] All right. Well, um… um…
James, you will retain, uh, an aura of… of-- -Mystique. -Charm and handsomeness.
translation.ko: 제임스, 매력과 미모가 풍기는 그 사람의 분위기는 그대로야

translation.en: -I sure hope so. -And masculinity.
No matter… no matter how old you are.
I hope I don't lose my hair. -I love my hair. -[laughing]
translation.ko: 머리는 안 빠졌으면 해요 지금 머리가 좋거든요

translation.en: -You know how fond I am of my hair. -I… I know.
translation.ko: 제 머리 사랑 아시죠? - 알다마다 - 그러니까요

translation.en: Wait. Did your father still have most of his hair when he died?
translation.ko: 할아버지는 돌아가실 때 머리숱이 많이 남아있었어요?

translation.en: -He did. -Okay, good, good.
All right, and… Wait. Did Grandpa still have most of his hair?
[chuckles] Um… he lost a little.
-Hi! -[Cian] Hello!
-Hi! -[Cian] Good to see you again.
-Good to see you again too. -[Cian] How've you been?
I've been pretty good. What about you?
[Cian] I've been good. It's been a while since I've seen you.
It has. Why, thank you.
[Cian] How've you been since we filmed season one?
I've been amazing. I've been so good.
I just started a new job yesterday. I'm volunteering at a thrift store.
translation.ko: 어제 새 일을 시작했는데 중고품 가게에서 자원봉사 해요

translation.en: I got to go on my first…
very first cruise to Ensenada, Mexico, and ate escargot.
translation.ko: 평생 처음으로 크루즈 타고 멕시코 엔세나다에 가서 달팽이 요리를 먹었어요

translation.en: Then my mom got a detached retina, and my brother graduated from college.
translation.ko: 엄마는 망막 박리증이 생겼고 남동생은 대학을 졸업했죠

translation.en: And so we had to drive to Indiana 'cause we couldn't fly
translation.ko: 그래서 차로 인디애나까지 갔어요 비행기 탔다간 엄마 한쪽 눈이 실명될 수 있댔거든요

translation.en: 'cause my mom would've gone blind in one eye.
translation.ko: 비행기 탔다간 엄마 한쪽 눈이 실명될 수 있댔거든요

translation.en: It was the… the best year ever.
How do you feel these days about being on the spectrum?
I feel like I'm learning to manage my disability even more,
translation.ko: 제 장애를 관리하는 법을 더 알아가고 있는 거 같아요

translation.en: because it was much harder in my childhood.
I felt like I was… 'cause I was so feeling… living…
translation.ko: 그땐 제가 마치 이 세상에 혼자인 느낌이었죠

translation.en: like I'm living in a world alone. I felt a lot like a mermaid back then.
translation.ko: 그땐 제가 마치 이 세상에 혼자인 느낌이었죠 저 혼자 인어인 기분이었어요

translation.en: People who are older than me were on land, and I was in the water.
translation.ko: 저보다 나이 많은 사람들은 육지에 살고 전 물속에 살았던 거죠

translation.en: [Cian] But now you've made it to land?
Yep. I'm not a mermaid anymore. Now I feel like a human.
translation.ko: 네, 이제 인어가 아니에요 지금은 사람 같아요

translation.en: [narrator] Abbey lives with her mom, Christine, in Los Angeles.
translation.ko: 애비는 로스앤젤레스에서 엄마 크리스틴과 함께 삽니다

translation.en: -What? What does she want? -[Christine] What do you think?
translation.ko: - 클레미가 왜 저래요? - 왜 그러는 거 같아?

translation.en: -She wants to eat. -Yes.
She always wants to eat. You're gonna be a fat dog.
translation.ko: 맨날 밥 달래요 너 그러다 뚱보 된다

translation.en: -We have had some issues with-- -This morning, she shitted in the house.
translation.ko: 문제가 좀 있었는데… 얘가 아침에 집 안에 똥 쌌어요

translation.en: She pooped in the house.
-Bad dog! -I woke up early. There was a big pile.
translation.ko: 아침에 산뜻하게 일어났는데 똥 무더기가 있었죠

translation.en: She didn't do it on purpose. There's something going on.
translation.ko: 일부러 그런 건 아니고 뭐가 안 좋은가 봐요

translation.en: Maybe she needs to go, you know, gluten-free vegan or something.
translation.ko: 글루텐프리 비건 식단으로 바꿔줘야 할 거 같아요

translation.en: -[growling] -[Christine] Don't talk back to me.
Don't be sassy with me.
[Cian] What do you think love feels like?
It feels like I'm a princess. I feel like I'm a… I'm a part of the world
translation.ko: 제가 공주가 된 거 같고 세상의 일부가 된 느낌이에요

translation.en: 'cause I've always wanted to be, and now I am.
-[Cian] In love? -Yep.
-[Cian] Who are you in love with? -David, of course.
[Cian] So, how long have you guys been together now?
-Two years. -Almost two years.
Well, like, one and a ha… one and a half year.
-[Cian] And how's that feel? -Good.
-Feels amazing. -[Cian] You guys happy together?
-Yes, we are. -Yes, we are.
-We're still together. -[Cian] So, David, tell me about Abbey.
translation.ko: 아직 사귀고 있죠 데이비드, 애비 얘기 좀 해줘요

translation.en: Well, let's see. She's as sweet as all of my favorite desserts.
translation.ko: 애비는 제가 제일 좋아하는 모든 디저트만큼 달콤해요

translation.en: [squealing] Aw! Thank you!
I'm the boy with autism who loves a girl with autism.
translation.ko: 전 자폐를 가진 소녀를 사랑하는 자폐를 가진 소년이에요

translation.en: Oh, that means a lot to me.
-Thank you. -Mm-hmm.
[Abbey] She is cute.
[Christine] It's been incredible on a hundred levels.
And David is amazing,
and she's in her safe space with him, which is something I just dreamed of.
translation.ko: 애비가 편하게 느끼는 사람이라 제 소원이 이뤄진 거죠

translation.en: Who is she looking at?
[Cian] You?
Today, David is coming over,
and he has a really… [chuckles emotionally] …big surprise for Abbey.
translation.ko: 애비를 위해 준비한 큰 선물을 공개할 건데요

translation.en: I can barely believe it's even happening.
translation.ko: 이런 일이 일어나다니 지금도 안 믿겨요

translation.en: I think that she's going to be… overwhelmed.
And I also think it might take a while to sink in,
but it's, like, Abbey's dream come true
and mine too. [chuckles]
Peace.
I have these… these giant stuffed lions, they're really big.
translation.ko: 엄청 큰 사자 인형이 여러 개예요

translation.en: -[Christine] In your room? Yeah. -[Abbey] Yeah.
[Abbey] Well, they stare at me.
David thinks they're looking at me 'cause… they're probably thinking how cute I am.
translation.ko: 데이비드는 제가 너무 예뻐서 다들 절 보는 거래요

translation.en: You two are really sweet together.
Oh, I see someone.
Hold on. I gotta go check.
[Dani] Do you have a clearer idea of the kind of person you're looking for?
translation.ko: 어떤 사람을 찾는지 좀 더 분명해졌나요?

translation.en: Oh yes. Someone who is ambitious and passionate as I am,
translation.ko: 네, 저처럼 야망과 열정이 넘치는 사람요

translation.en: like, we're destined to be a power couple,
translation.ko: 영향력 있는 커플이 될 운명인 거죠

translation.en: but also have an animation company, a successful animation studio,
translation.ko: 거기에 성공적인 애니메이션 스튜디오를 가진 남자요

translation.en: like, a big animation team.
-[seagulls calling] -[jaunty suspenseful music playing]
[narrator] In Venice Beach,
Dani is arriving for her blind date.
[Dani] That him?
[narrator] Dani is meeting Matt.
He likes vehicular cleanliness
and World War II history.
[narrator] He doesn't like celebrity obsession
or hunting trophies.
Well, it's really nice to meet you. Good evening. I'm Dani.
translation.ko: 만나서 정말 반가워요 안녕하세요, 전 대니예요

translation.en: -I'm Matt. Nice to meet you. -Nice to meet you.
Love your blazer. Goes so well with the purple.
-Thank you. -Shall we have a seat?
All right.
You been to this hotel before?
It is my first time here at this hotel.
I love the panoramic view,
and it's sunny, so I'll just take off my jacket while I'm at it, so…
translation.ko: 날도 화창하니 재킷 벗고 햇볕을 쬘까 봐요

translation.en: Anyway… So, Dani, where you from?
-[Dani] Pasadena. -[Matt] Ah, I do like Pasadena.
I love going up there for a lot of the scenery.
translation.ko: 거기 경치 보러 가는 걸 좋아해요

translation.en: I'm from lovely San Diego. It's been a wonderful drive up here--
translation.ko: 전 샌디에이고 출신이라 여기 오는 길에 풍경이 근사했죠

translation.en: That's where San Diego Comic-Con is from.
Ah, yes. I'm very much, uh, into San Diego Comic-Con. I've been attending every year since 1994,
translation.ko: 네, 전 거기에 푹 빠져서 1994년부터 매년 가고 있고

translation.en: and it's my absolute favorite place in the world to be.
But, you know, I just love comics, cartoons, geeky stuff,
translation.ko: 전 코믹스와 카툰 괴짜스러운 걸 사랑해요

translation.en: and it's pretty much just what makes my life go.
translation.ko: 제 삶을 이끄는 원동력이라고 할 수 있죠

translation.en: Oh yes. [chuckles softly]
Are you into comics, too, or cartoons, or science fiction, or geeky stuff?
translation.ko: 코믹스나 카툰, SF물 괴짜스러운 걸 좋아하나요?

translation.en: I like anything science fiction, and I like… I do like comics and animation.
translation.ko: SF물은 다 좋아하고 코믹스랑 애니메이션도 좋아해요

translation.en: You know, like Disney television, Nickelodeon, um, Cartoon Network.
[Matt] Oh yeah, I'm a big Cartoon Network fan.
-Very big. Dexter's Lab, Samurai Jack. -Oh yes.
Uh, I have picked up on Sonic Prime. Uh…
Sonic Prime is, um, definitely an epic one right now.
[Matt] I'm liking that.
One of my homeboys, Omar, actually, is a writer for the show.
translation.ko: 제 고향 친구 오마르가 그 쇼의 작가예요

translation.en: -So I've been watching that-- -Wow! He's a writer? On Sonic Prime?
translation.ko: - 그래서 그것도 보고… - 와, '소닉 프라임' 작가라고요?

translation.en: Mm-hmm. And he plays Pokémon cards with me on weekends because we're huge dorks.
translation.ko: 네 완전 덕후들이라 주말에는 포켓몬 카드 게임도 해요

translation.en: Whoa!
[Abbey] Have you seen Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse?
[Matt] I have. I'm a big fan of Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse.
translation.ko: 봤죠, 전 그 영화를 무척 좋아해요

translation.en: I think he's just the greatest superhero of all time.
-I especially love the '90s cartoon. -Oh yes.
That's what I modeled my haircut after.
Peter Parker?
[Matt] Peter Parker in the '90s. It's what I'm passionate about.
translation.ko: - 피터 파커요? - 90년대 피터 파커요 전 거기에 열정이 있고 그걸 좋아해요

translation.en: It's what I like. Comics, and cartoons, and animation stuff.
translation.ko: 전 거기에 열정이 있고 그걸 좋아해요 코믹스랑 카툰, 애니메이션요

translation.en: I know, I tend to be hogging the spotlight right now.
-Dani, I wanna hear you talk more… -Right. Thank you so much. [chuckles]
translation.ko: 대니, 이제 당신 얘길 들려줘요 알았어요, 고마워요

translation.en: Now that you're conscious about what you're talking,
translation.ko: 당신 얘기만 한다는 걸 이제 알았지만

translation.en: I know you feel carried away about the entire conversation.
translation.ko: 그만큼 전체 대화에 열중했다는 의미기도 하죠

translation.en: So, uh, how old are you?
I'm 37. People are kind of shocked by my age.
It's like, "You're 37. You're not 26?"
"No, I'm 37." I don't know how I do it either. I just--
I was gonna say the same thing. People are shocked
translation.ko: 저도 그런 경험 많아요 어려 보인다면서 놀라워하죠

translation.en: because I look so young. I still look like a teenager. I'm 28.
translation.ko: 저도 그런 경험 많아요 어려 보인다면서 놀라워하죠 아직 10대처럼 보이지만 28살이에요

translation.en: -It's a good problem to have. -Yes.
[Matt] Maybe it's just something about people like us,
translation.ko: 우리 같은 사람은 우리가 사랑하는 일에

translation.en: always indulging in the things we love so much.
Oh yes.
So, what actually got you into animation?
Well, it's because I have my own little animation company.
We help educate, elevate, empower youth on the autism spectrum
translation.ko: 자폐 스펙트럼인 청소년을 교육하고 힘을 북돋아 줘요

translation.en: by helping them turn their passion in animation into a career.
translation.ko: 애니메이션에 대한 열정을 경력으로 만들어 주거든요

translation.en: That's actually really cool. Uh, that's really cool.
translation.ko: 그거 정말 멋진 일이네요 아주 멋져요

translation.en: Like, oh my gosh.
By the way, I am on the autism spectrum.
You can easily tell I'm on the spectrum, too, from the way I talk about Spider-Man.
translation.ko: 제가 자폐 스펙트럼인 건 스파이더맨 얘기하는 것만 봐도 - 티가 나죠 - 그렇군요

translation.en: I can tell you're on the spectrum. I hear it in your voice and the way you talk so intensely and passionately,
translation.ko: 당신이 자폐 스펙트럼인 것도 강렬하고 열띤 화법에서 보여요

translation.en: and I think it makes you even more beautiful.
Oh yes.
-[Abbey] Thank you. -[Matt] Good job.
-Cheers. -All right, cheers.
-Wow. The taste is perfect. -Ooh!
Oh, not too shabby. That's right about what I was looking for today.
translation.ko: 나쁘지 않네요 제가 오늘 바라던 맛이에요

translation.en: Getting a little nippy. I'll put my jacket on.
Ah, much better.
So, anyways, what do you expect from a date?
Well, I just expect a good time and someone I can really click with,
translation.ko: 잘 통하는 상대를 만나 즐거운 시간을 보내길 바라죠

translation.en: be myself with, and be happy.
And I don't really want someone in my life who I feel is gonna be dragging me down.
translation.ko: 같이 있으면 우울해지는 사람과 제 삶을 함께하긴 싫어요

translation.en: I don't think you are. You're very nice.
Thank you so much.
Very friendly. What are you looking for in your love life?
translation.ko: - 고마워요 - 정말 친근하고요 어떤 애인을 원하세요?

translation.en: What I'm looking for in a love life who is dedicated,
translation.ko: 제가 원하는 애인은 자기 일에 열중하고

translation.en: always, um, motivated to keep the job.
translation.ko: 늘 그 일을 꾸준히 하는 사람이에요

translation.en: I know getting your life together can be easier said than done.
translation.ko: 제 앞가림 하며 사는 게 말처럼 쉽지 않아요

translation.en: I graduated from college and had to move back home with my parents.
translation.ko: 전 대학을 졸업하고 다시 부모님 집으로 와야 했죠

translation.en: And then I just was hanging out and about, like, just kind of just being a lazy slob.
translation.ko: 그 후 그냥 하는 일 없이 빈둥대는 빈대처럼 살았어요

translation.en: And I had to work my way up, getting a job as a chauffeur.
Now I work at a trading card company, and so it's--
And you earn money how? Like, you earn some income?
translation.ko: 돈은 어떻게 버세요? 그러니까 수입이 있나요?

translation.en: Oh yeah. I have a living just working for a trading card company.
translation.ko: 그럼요, 트레이딩 카드사에서 일해서 벌고 있죠

translation.en: But will it work for the animation industry as well?
translation.ko: 애니메이션 업계에서 돈을 벌 수도 있을까요?

translation.en: Ugh! The animation industry…
I don't know.
-[birds singing] -[dramatic movie intro music playing]
[woman] Connor.
Connor.
You gotta get ready.
Get ready, that, uh…
I am ready.
[sighs] My pants are sliding down.
Need a belt?
[narrator] Connor's sister, Anna,
is helping him prepare for a night of speed dating.
A belt is not a fashion statement. It is a tool…
translation.ko: 벨트는 멋을 위한 게 아니라 하나의 도구야

translation.en: Okay.
…that keeps your pants from falling down.
-[Anna] All right. -[Connor] Over here…
How are you feeling? Like, what are you… Nervous? Excited?
translation.ko: 기분은 어때? 지금 긴장돼? 아니면 설레?

translation.en: A bit… bit frustrated.
Why are you frustrated?
I was just starting a movie when all of a sudden, I am…
translation.ko: 이제 막 영화를 틀었는데 느닷없이 이렇게…

translation.en: [Anna] I know, but this is gonna be a new chapter in your life,
translation.ko: 그 마음은 알지만 오빠 인생의 새 장이 될 거야

translation.en: and I get that it can kinda mess with your routine, but…
translation.ko: 물론 오빠의 루틴을 망가뜨릴 순 있지만…

translation.en: I understand change is good for you, but come on!
translation.ko: 변화는 좋다는 거 이해해 근데 너무하잖아!

translation.en: [sighs] Hope can be dangerous, and if things don't work out,
translation.ko: 희망은 위험할 수 있어 일이 뜻대로 안 되면…

translation.en: [Anna] Connor, I feel like you should go into this with an open mind.
translation.ko: 오빠, 다 잘될 거라고 열린 마음을 가져봐

translation.en: Maybe don't go in there expecting to marry this person.
translation.ko: 결혼 상대를 찾으러 간다고 생각하지 말고

translation.en: Just go in there expecting to have a fun, different experience meeting new people.
translation.ko: 그냥 새로운 사람들 만나 재밌고 색다른 경험을 하는 거야

translation.en: I'm okay. Don't be doubtful. Just… have fun with it.
translation.ko: 난 괜찮아, 의심 안 할게 그냥 재밌게 보내면 돼

translation.en: -You're gonna have fun. -Yeah.
-[Anna] You're ready? -Yes.
[Anna chuckling] Okay.
Just give me a moment.
I just need to step out for a bit.
I think he's gonna do a great job. I think right now, he's a little bit…
translation.ko: 오빠는 잘할 거예요 지금은 그냥 좀…

translation.en: maybe nervous, not used to the change.
translation.ko: 변화에 익숙지 않아서 긴장되는 걸 거예요

translation.en: But, like, there's no one more deserving of this experience than Connor.
translation.ko: 하지만 오빠는 누구보다 이 경험을 할 자격이 충분해요

translation.en: He has the biggest heart,
and I feel like he hasn't had a chance to share that with somebody else.
translation.ko: 그걸 누구와 나눌 기회가 없었다고 생각해요

translation.en: He won't come to me and say that he's lonely,
but he's always wanted to have somebody, and I think it's hard sometimes
translation.ko: 누가 있었으면 좋겠다는 말은 안 할 거예요 근데 형제자매들이 사랑하는 사람과 있는 걸

translation.en: watching his siblings be with other people romantically.
translation.ko: 근데 형제자매들이 사랑하는 사람과 있는 걸 보기 힘들 때가 있겠죠

translation.en: [Anna] I'd do anything for him, honestly.
Literally my favorite person.
[Connor] Okay.
[Anna] I really hope he finds love.
-You feeling better? -[Connor] Yeah.
I hope someone gets Chewey down.
-Hi! -Hi, Abbey.
Hello there.
What did you buy me?
-Would you, uh, like me to read it to you? -Sure.
"Abbey."
"Since you have been an extra amazing girlfriend,
I want to take you somewhere special."
"Bring your candy to snack on the aeroplane."
"We are going somewhere where we will see lots of our favorite animals."
translation.ko: '우리가 좋아하는 동물을 많이 볼 수 있는 곳으로 갈 거야'

translation.en: "I am bringing you, your mom, and my sisters with us
on a wonderful trip across the world."
"I want to make your dream come true by taking you on a fun vacation."
translation.ko: '신나는 휴가를 보내며 네 꿈을 이뤄주고 싶어'

translation.en: "Kenya say yes to coming with me to Africa to see our favorite animal, the lion?"
translation.ko: '아프리카 케냐로 가서' '우리가 제일 좋아하는 동물인 사자를 직접 볼래?'

translation.en: Yes!
-Thanks. -You're welcome.
[Christine] Do you know what David just asked you?
To go to Africa!
Maybe once we sell the house.
This isn't in the future. This is happening now.
translation.ko: 미래에 가자는 게 아니라 지금 가자는 거야

translation.en: The trip has been booked to go to Africa.
[gasps] Oh my God!
We're going to Africa! It's really happening.
translation.ko: 우리 아프리카 간다! 꿈 아니고 진짜로요

translation.en: [Christine] You're gonna see lions in the wild. Yes.
translation.ko: - 야생에 있는 사자를 볼 거야 - 맞아

translation.en: [Christine] And what else? Elephants, giraffes.
[David] Yes, and hippos, and zebras, and rhinos, and croc--
[Abbey] Monkeys.
Yeah, and crocodiles, antelopes, and wildebeests,
and buffaloes, and meerkats, and warthogs, hornbills, and baboons.
This is so romantic.
-[chuckling] -[Abbey] Thank you! [David] You're welcome.
Thanks.
Let's go get those big lions.
They both want this so badly.
What's the first thing Abbey said to David when she met him?
translation.ko: 애비랑 데이비드가 만나서 처음 나눈 대화가 뭐죠?

translation.en: He said, "I've been to Africa,"
translation.ko: 데이비드가 아프리카에 가봤다니까 애비도 가고 싶은데

translation.en: and she said, "I wanna go to… to Africa, but my mom has no money." [chuckling]
translation.ko: 데이비드가 아프리카에 가봤다니까 애비도 가고 싶은데 엄마가 돈이 없댔잖아요

translation.en: Which is pretty much the case.
So it was… that this is happening now, just amazing.
translation.ko: 근데 그게 지금 현실로 이뤄진다니까 정말 멋지죠

translation.en: -[Abbey] What's she saying? -"I love you. I love you. I love you."
[Christine] It's been a year,
and she has progressed, and progressed, and progressed
translation.ko: 애비가 그동안 발전을 거듭해 데이비드와 가까워졌어요

translation.en: in getting close to him, which is…
translation.ko: 애비가 그동안 발전을 거듭해 데이비드와 가까워졌어요 그건 정말 큰 성과죠

translation.en: [emotionally] …a huge thing.
You know, she loves spending time with him,
and he's so kind to her, and he lets her be her.
translation.ko: 데이비드는 애비를 있는 그대로 받아들여 줘요

translation.en: God, why is she staring at me?
[David] 'Cause she loves you.
For me personally, as her mother, and I know I speak for a lot of parents, a lot of parents,
translation.ko: 개인적으로는 애비 엄마로서 많은 부모를 대변할 텐데

translation.en: it's what's gonna happen when we're not here? You know?
translation.ko: 우리가 없으면 어쩌나 하는 걱정이 커요

translation.en: Will they be alone? Or I have to spend the rest of my life taking care of her.
translation.ko: 애가 혼자 남겨질까? 내 평생 아이를 돌봐야 하나?

translation.en: And I don't feel that anymore. I actually feel like she's gonna launch.
translation.ko: 이제 그런 걱정은 없어요 애비가 날개를 활짝 펼 거 같아요

translation.en: It… it rocks you to your core when they… when they win.
translation.ko: 아이가 잘하는 걸 보면 가슴이 벅차죠

translation.en: I love puppies.
Same.
[Johnny] Down here is where all the fun starts.
translation.ko: "남자의 동굴에서 일어난 일은 무덤까지 비밀" 여기에 재미가 한가득이야

translation.en: [James] Oh, very good, very good.
[narrator] In New Hampshire, James is at his friend Donny's house
translation.ko: 뉴햄프셔에선 제임스가 친구 도니 집에서 파티를 준비하죠

translation.en: preparing for a get-together.
translation.ko: 뉴햄프셔에선 제임스가 친구 도니 집에서 파티를 준비하죠 "웃통 깐 남자, 술 없음 웃통 깐 여자, 술 공짜"

translation.en: -[Johnny] May I offer you a drink? -[James] Oh, yes, please. Thank you.
translation.ko: "웃통 깐 남자, 술 없음 웃통 깐 여자, 술 공짜" - 마실 거 줄까? - 좋지, 고마워

translation.en: -Here you are. -Ooh, yes, thank you.
-Why don't you use the bottle opener? -[James] I can get the…
Just angle up a little more, till you get a hook.
translation.ko: 딱 걸릴 때까지 좀 더 비틀어

translation.en: That's it.
Oh, there, got it. Let's hope no hair got in the drink.
-Cheers to that. -Cheers.
What do you say we start a fire?
Yes, yes, I do like fire. [giggles]
[Cian] Do you sometimes worry that you won't find love?
translation.ko: 사랑을 못 찾을까 봐 걱정도 되나요?

translation.en: Uh, yes, I do.
Sometimes if I find… if I meet a woman who seems to be a good match for me
translation.ko: 때로 저랑 어울리는 듯한 여성을 만난 거 같은데

translation.en: and then is not, I… I keep thinking to myself,
translation.ko: 알고 보니 아닐 때 속으로 계속 생각해요

translation.en: "Oh, I thought for sure she was the one, but she wasn't."
"What? Am I ever going to find the one?" You know, that kind of thing.
translation.ko: '뭐지? 내 짝을 찾긴 할까?' 이런 생각들요

translation.en: [Cian] So, last season, you dated Emma.
Did you hope there was still something there romantically?
Uh, yes, of course I did. I certainly did hope that,
but, well, there wasn't, unfortunately. It's… it's too bad.
We still hang out. We… we still… we still speak with each other.
translation.ko: 근데 여전히 같이 놀고 서로 얘기도 해요

translation.en: We're still friends, so that's pretty nice. And, yeah… [mumbles]
translation.ko: 여전히 친구니까 그건 참 잘된 일이고…

translation.en: -[Johnny] Let there be fire. -[James laughs]
Yes. Better make sure my hair doesn't get too close to the fire.
translation.ko: 그래 불길에 머리 안 닿게 해야지

translation.en: Yeah, same here. I'm wearing hairspray.
The reason why I have my pompadour and sideburns
translation.ko: 내가 올백 머리에 구레나룻이 있는 이유는

translation.en: is because I am an avid fan of Elvis Presley.
[James] Oh nice.
He's a real inspiration to look for love. A lot of women dig Elvis.
translation.ko: 사랑을 찾는 데 귀감이 돼 많은 여성이 엘비스를 좋아하지

translation.en: Yes, yes, so I've noticed.
[Johnny] And look who's here.
-Hey, guys. -[James] Yes, hello. How are you doing?
-[Emma] Good. So good to see you guys. -Great to see you also.
translation.ko: - 응, 너희 봐서 좋다 - 나도 그래

translation.en: -Hey, that's a very nice hat, Emma. -Oh, thank you.
translation.ko: - 모자 진짜 멋지다, 에마 - 아, 고마워

translation.en: -[James] Yes, of course. -[Johnny] Lovely hat.
-Good to see you again. -Hello, how are you doing?
translation.ko: - 다시 봐서 반가워 - 나도 - 스튜어트, 잘 지냈어? - 잘 지냈지, 반가워

translation.en: -Good, how are you? -How are you doing, Julia?
translation.ko: - 스튜어트, 잘 지냈어? - 잘 지냈지, 반가워 너도 잘 지냈어, 줄리아?

translation.en: -[Julia] Good. -[James] Good, yes.
So, what's new? How have you been?
translation.ko: 요즘 어떻게 지내? 재밌는 거 있어?

translation.en: Oh, I'm still working. Still find time to spend with my friends, everything,
translation.ko: 여전히 일하면서 친구들 만날 시간도 내고 그래

translation.en: but nothing too much out of the ordinary has happened recently, I guess, yes.
translation.ko: 평소랑 다른 일은 최근에 별로 없던 거 같아

translation.en: Actually, as a… a matter of fact,
I'm going to be… [chuckles]
…I'm going to be going on a date soon. Yes, isn't that great?
translation.ko: 곧 데이트에 나갈 거 같아 그래, 굉장하지?

translation.en: -Nice! -That's awesome!
-[Emma] Nice! -Yes, I mean, I don't know--
-Way to go, James. -Yes, I… I…
My man James.
Yes, I mean, I hope it's okay for me talking about this in front of you, Emma.
translation.ko: 그래, 근데 에마 네 앞에서 이런 얘기 해도 괜찮을까?

translation.en: -I hope you don't mind. -Oh, no, it's okay. No, I'm…
Please… please talk about it.
I'm… I'm here for it, so…
Okay, good, good. I'm glad you're… you're okay with it.
So, mm… but…
Yes, um… Oh, ooh. God, oh, awkward silence now.
All right, Sparky. Here's what you gotta do, James.
If you wanna court the little lady, you gotta be a straight shooter, got it?
translation.ko: 여자의 마음을 사로잡으려면 단도직입으로 말해야 해

translation.en: -I'm wishing you the best of luck. -Thank you very much.
translation.ko: - 난 네가 잘되길 빌어 - 정말 고마워

translation.en: In fact, we all are.
-Yeah, we really are. -Good. Yes. Thank you very much.
Oh good. Good.
And, uh… if you don't mind me asking,
when did you learn that you were on the spectrum?
I learned that when I was 11 when I moved in with my aunt and uncle.
translation.ko: 11살 때 이모 내외 집으로 들어가면서 알았어요

translation.en: I used to live with my parents, uh, but the, um… it didn't last that long.
translation.ko: 그 전엔 부모님과 살았는데 그리 오래가진 않았죠 슬픈 이야기예요

translation.en: -It's a sad story. -[Matt] Oh, yeah.
-I won't get into things there. -Mm-hmm.
All right, excuse me. I'll be right back.
-Cheers! Thank you. -One moment.
Dani is actually a very pretty, very sweet girl.
translation.ko: 대니는 아주 예쁘고 무척 다정한 사람이에요

translation.en: We do share a lot of common interests. It's really nice.
translation.ko: 공통 관심사가 많아서 그 점이 좋아요

translation.en: I do think that there is some potential there.
I do like her. I do think she's sweet.
She's a little on the shy side, but I guess that's what happens
translation.ko: 약간 수줍어하긴 하는데 소개팅 처음 나오면 원래 그런 거잖아요?

translation.en: on a blind date for the first time, right?
translation.ko: 소개팅 처음 나오면 원래 그런 거잖아요?

translation.en: -All right, and back again. -Okay.
You miss me?
Well, I miss you.
-Then you better work on your aim. -Oops!
-Sorry, lame joke. -[giggles]
-No, you don't have to take shots at me. -Sorry.
Well, you are from San Diego, right?
But do you, um, live… how far is the drive from you?
translation.ko: 거기 사는… 여기까지 차로 얼마나 걸려요?

translation.en: Ugh, it's like, you know, two and a half hours to be up here.
-Two and a half hours? -[Matt] Yeah.
But I like coming up here.
Do you think about moving from San Diego to LA?
translation.ko: 샌디에이고에서 LA로 이사 올 생각은 없어요?

translation.en: Uh, I've thought about it a couple times. But I really love what I get to do,
translation.ko: 두어 번 생각해 보긴 했는데 거기서 하는 일도 좋고

translation.en: and I really love where I am.
Have you ever been on a blind date before?
Believe it or not, I have never been on a blind date before.
Sometimes they don't work out
and sometimes it's, "Face it, tiger, you hit the jackpot."
translation.ko: '인정해, 너 대박 터진 거야'를 시전할 때도 있죠

translation.en: Little Spider-Man reference there.
Of course, that's how Peter met Mary Jane. On a blind date.
translation.ko: 피터가 메리 제인을 소개팅으로 만났을 때요

translation.en: Yeah.
Do you think I'm cool?
-You're looking cool. -[Matt] Okay, yeah.
And now, as the sun sets,
I think it's just, you know, a little golden hour fun, you know.
-[Dani] Mm-hmm. -But I could do something like this again.
Oh yes, maybe. [chuckles awkwardly]
[Matt] As it turns to twilight, you okay with just watching the sunset?
translation.ko: 땅거미가 내려앉으려고 하니 같이 석양을 감상할까요?

translation.en: Oh yes. Mm-hmm.
-Oh my, the sun's almost completely gone. -[Matt] Mm-hmm.
-Okay. -I had a nice time with you.
Yeah, I had a really nice time with you too.
And I've never had a blind date before. You put my nerves at ease with this.
translation.ko: 소개팅은 처음이었는데 대니 덕분에 긴장을 덜었어요

translation.en: -Thank you so much. -Would you like to do this again sometime?
Well, we could. I'll let you know.
Yeah, I would be happy to see you again soon, Dani.
Maybe we'll see each other. We'll… we'll see.
translation.ko: 또 볼 수도 있겠죠, 상황 봐서요

translation.en: thanks for the hug.
-Call the evening adjourned. -[Dani] Adjourned.
-Thank you so much. I'll see you soon. -Thank you. Bye-bye.
translation.ko: - 고마워요, 조만간 봐요 - 고마워요, 안녕히 가세요

translation.en: [narrator] Connor is arriving at a speed-dating event
hosted by a local autism organization.
[narrator] It will be his first-ever dating experience.
translation.ko: 코너는 평생 처음으로 데이트를 경험할 겁니다

translation.en: Just have fun with it. You're gonna be fine.
You're gonna be okay. Deep breath.
-[woman 1] Hold on! Quiet! -Oh.
Hello, welcome to Table Talk. Thanks so much for being here!
We've got about five minutes per table,
and when I ring the bell…
…the ladies are on the move tonight.
All right? So all the ladies will start and move through the line.
And you'll take your dating cards, and you'll check yes or no
if you like that person and maybe wanna meet up with them again.
translation.ko: "테이블 토크 - 매치 카드" 다시 만나고 싶은 사람을 알려주세요

translation.en: We hope you have so much fun tonight. Your first five minutes starts now.
translation.ko: 즐거운 시간 보내시길 바라며 첫 5분이 지금 시작됩니다

translation.en: Hey, how are you?
Hi, "Jaylene." I'm Connor.
It's Jalene.
Oh, Jalene. So sorry.
Okay, thank you. Yeah.
Yes, uh…
So, anything you want to talk about?
Sure. Do you… have any hobbies?
Yes, I do.
What kind?
What kind?
my hob… my hobbies is…
listening to music.
I like listening to music.
[Connor] Do you have any pets?
I used to have cats.
So,
is there anything you'd care to ask me?
-No. -[Connor] Oh.
Right, so sorry.
All right. Ladies are on the move.
-It was nice talking to you. -It was nice talking to you too.
See you again.
-[woman] Hi. -Hello.
-[woman] Hi. -Emily. I'm Connor.
Nice to meet you, Connor.
So, um…
uh, so what would you…
what should we talk about?
Well, first of all, do you have any…
what are your hobbies? What do you like to…
Oh, well… well, I… I like collecting things.
[Emily] Oh, what kinds of things?
Well, this is gonna sound crazy, but I enjoy collecting swords.
translation.ko: 이상하게 들리겠지만 난 검을 수집하는 게 좋아요

translation.en: -[Emily] Swords?! -Yeah.
So cool!
Yeah.
So, uh, do you have any allergies of any kind?
Interesting question to ask. Um…
Why do you ask? Is my nose…
Oh, no, no, no, no, no.
It's just I was wondering if there are any… any foods you were allergic to.
translation.ko: 그냥 알레르기 있는 음식이 있는지 궁금했어요

translation.en: Not that I can think of, no. I just…
I really don't like the smell of… peanut butter.
I don't know… how it happened,
but every time I see a thing of peanut butter or ketchup, it's like, "Ugh!"
translation.ko: 땅콩버터나 케첩 관련된 것만 봐도 '웩!' 소리가 나와요

translation.en: Okay, let's, uh…
Do you, um…
do you like nature, by any chance?
That is a very good question. I've never really thought about that.
translation.ko: 좋은 질문이네요 한 번도 생각 안 해봤는데

translation.en: I guess I am more of a city person.
I just… I prefer the hustle and bustle.
-[dinging] -All right, everybody, it's time to move.
-[Connor] It was nice meeting you. -Nice meeting you too.
Thank you.
-[Cian] Hey, Connor. -Yes?
[Cian] Are you writing yes or no while they're sitting there?
Am I not supposed to?
[Cian] You might wanna wait till they've left. They can probably see.
translation.ko: 자리 이동할 때 하는 게 좋죠 상대가 볼 수 있으니까

translation.en: Damn! I knew I'd mess that up.
